titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Mr. Price (GA) moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 231 - 188 (Roll no. 947).

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity

bill.summary: 12/20/2011--Introduced. Disapproves of the behavior of the Representative from Florida, Mr. West, for bringing discredit to the House by offending the memory of those who died during the Holocaust.
